transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Anshika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha bolo madam.
Executive: Haanji sir aapko aayi thi field executive ki call unse baat hui aapki?
Customer: Ha baat to hui thi. Usne bola mai aaunga address change karne ja sakta tha, aise bol raha tha wo.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Shayad aayega ek do din me aisa bol raha tha.
Executive: To unhone bola ki wo aayenge?
Customer: Ha wo bol raha tha ki kuch hamara kya address hamare do office hai, main office hamara Bhuj me hai aur dusra kuch hamara Surat me hai aur hamara jo address hai na wo Bhuj se connection tha isliye wo dal raha tha to address me wo address me available nahi dikha raha tha. Usne mere ko bola hai ki mail karne ko bhai ko bola hai, bhai ko mail kar denge na to wo Surat ka address mil jayega.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Abhi bhai se baat ho gayi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Thik hai to wo waha jayenge.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Surat hi aayenge wo Surat idhar mere ko Surat hi delivery hamara kaam chahiye.
Executive: Achha to sir wo aapko matlab sir ha wo aapko sirf services samjhane aayenge ya jab bhi aapko koi issue hoga wo aayenge?
Customer: Samjhane ke liye bola hai bas ek baar samjhane ke liye aayenge aisa bola tha.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Mai ek baar aapko samjha jaunga kaise use karna hai, kya use karna hai, kaise catalog lena hai, kaise karne ka hai. To ek baar sab samjhane ke liye aayega aisa bola tha.
Customer: Ye aaya nahi hai abhi tak.
Executive: Achha ek baar matlab.
Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ek baar wo total aapko services samjha ke ek baar total aapko wo sari services samjha ke jayenge, thik hai? Kaise use ha kaise use karne hai, kaise catalog aapka banana hai, matlab kaise launch karna hai. Ha kaise apni tarah se banani hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Fir kabhi uske baad aapko koi bhi issue hota hai, koi bhi problem hoti hai to maybe yaha pe kya hai ki mai headquarter se baat karti hu, thik hai? To jab aapka account headquarter me aa jata hai IndiaMART ke to waha pe pura online hota hai to isliye sorry video call hota hai to is base me nahi hota hai na? To abhi wo aapko samjha ke chale jayenge ek baar but fir maybe aapko koi bhi issue hoga to fir aap mujhe connect kariyega.
Customer: Thik hai?
Executive: Okay madam, thik hai. Wo sabhi humko use karna hai to hum ek baar samajh lenge isse baad me to wo kuch issue hoga to hum aapko call kar sakte hai.
Executive: Ha sir sabse jyada kaun isko use karta hai? Aap isko use karte ho ya aapke bhai use karte hai?
Customer: Mere bhai sabse jyadatar wo use karta hai. Abhi kya hum karna Surat nahi use hai, abhi idhar ka Surat ka kaam ka aur video kisi ko aa nahi raha tha na isliye abhi Bhuj se wo kar raha tha. Hamara main to Bhuj Surat me hi karna hai, humko sikhne ka hi chahiye humko idhar ki chahiye.
Executive: Achha to kyuki yaha pe buylead vagera to aap consume karte ho yaha pe, kam karte ho but karte ho. To abhi wahi jo buylead jo consume karte hai aapke bhai karte hai?
Customer: Abhi to udhar se kar rahe hai, ab udhar se karne idhar ke liye hi karwaya humne alag hi plan karwaya hai na? Idhar ke liye hi karwaya hai, idhar humko jarurat hi nahi hai kyuki Bhuj to chota city hai. Idhar to kuch jarurat nahi hai, idhar Surat ke liye hi karwaya humne.
Executive: Surat.
Customer: Surat.
Customer: Surat me aap deal karna chahte hai.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Achha sir to abhi tak jitne bhi.
Executive: Achha to abhi jitne bhi buylead jaise aap consume vagera karte ho online aur samne se jo aapke paas calls bhi aati hai, hai na?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aapke paas do teen calls.
Customer: Mera most samajh lo aap mera most ka manufacturing ka hai aur wholesale ka hai, retail ka kaam nahi hai. Jo bhi lead aa rahi hai na wo samajh lo meri direction se alag hi lead aa rahi hai. Aur ek do saree, ek do saree aise lead me ek do ek do saree to handle nahi karta hu kyuki ek do saree me sell nahi karta hu.
Executive: Ha wo na kyuki kya hai ki aapke.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapke na platform par dikhegi aapko sabhi tarah ki. Isliye na IndiaMART ne kuch filters banaye hue hai. Kyuki dekhiye hum buyer ko to rok nahi sakte apni requirement post karne ke liye hai na? Usko ek chahiye, usko wo chahiye to hai na to wo to apni requirement dalte hai lekin humne aapke liye aise ek filter banaye hue hai ki aap agar bulk order me hi deal karna hai aapko, bada order me deal karna hai to waha pe ek bulk ka filter banaya hua hai. Jab aap us pe click karke buylead search karoge tab aapko jaake bulk order wale buylead dikhegi. Hai na? Maine jab welcome call li thi tab aapko ye bataya tha but thik hai aapko jab field executive aayega wo ek baar fir se aapko samjha denge hai na? Nahi samajh aata to mai ek baar aapko.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: To kya hota hai ek baar me sab ek saath samajh nahi aa raha sir.
Executive: Ha nahi.
Customer: Thoda thoda.
Executive: Samjhaya jayega live samjhaya jayega na to maybe samajh lunga aur usko bhi samjha dunga sir. Dhire dhire idea aa jayega sir.
Customer: Ha ha wahi kyuki buyer jo hai wo ek saree ki bhi requirement post karega wo bahut sari saree ki bhi karega. Bas wo humko filter karna hai.
Customer: Humko malum nahi padta humko.
Customer: Hum filter kar sakte hai na humko humko kaun sa lead mil raha hai wahi humko to filter karna hai na.
Executive: Ha ha wahi filter karke wo karna hoga. Jab wo aa jayenge unse aapke baat ho jayegi aapko samajh aa jayega aa jayega na? Agar nahi bhi aata aap mujhe connect kar lijiyega mai ek baar video me usse screen share karke ek ek ek ek cheez aur dobara aapko samjha dungi, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Kitne din ka time unhone ha kitne din ka time unhone diya tha aapko aane ke liye?
Customer: Usne shanivar ko mere ko bola tha ki aap mere ko mail karne ka hai aur shanivar ko shayad bhai ne mail kar bhi diya hai tab wo aaj sham ko call karunga aaj ek do din me bhi.
Customer: To kya hua aage?
Executive: Achha achha thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Ha jab bhi aapke baat ho jaye ek baar aap mujhe connect kar lijiyega, thik hai?
Customer: Sure sure.
Executive: Okay sir, okay sir.
Customer: Okay okay thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants executive to visit for service explanation.

- Address showing unavailable during registration.

- Wants to deal in Surat only.

- Difficulty in understanding the platform.

- Receiving irrelevant leads.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed field executive visit for explanation.

- Advised to email for Surat address.

- Explained about bulk order filter.

- Offered to explain again via screen share.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to connect after field executive visit.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, address, filter, services
